resources.string: iPhone 11 Pro Max have a textured matte glass back and polished stainless steel band, and come in four stunning finishes including a beautiful new midnight green.

- Super Retina XDR display
 - 6.5-inch (diagonal) fully OLED 
 Multi-Touch display
 - HDR screen
 - 2688 x 1242 pixels resolution at 458 ppi
 - 2,000,000: 1 contrast ratio (typical)

Type	: Li-Ion 3969 mAh, non-removable 
(15.04 Wh)
 Standby time (LTE) : 5 hours longer than 
 iPhone XS Max
 Talk time							: up to 20 hours
 Video playback			: up to 20 hours
 Video streaming			: up to 12 hours
 Fast charging				: Up to 50% charge in 
 30 minutes with 18W adapter or higher
 - Built-in rechargeable lithium-ion battery
 - Wireless charging (works with Qi8 chargers)
 - Charges via USB to computer system or power adapter
